clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Investigated for use treatment in brain cancer and cancer tumors unspecified

incompatibilities.description: The risk or severity of Thrombosis can be increased when Darbepoetin alfa is combined with Alanosine
The risk or severity of Thrombosis can be increased when Erythropoietin is combined with Alanosine
The risk or severity of Thrombosis can be increased when Peginesatide is combined with Alanosine
The risk or severity of Thrombosis can be increased when Methoxy polyethylene glycol epoetin beta is combined with Alanosine
Alanosine may decrease effectiveness of Technetium Tc 99m oxidronate as a diagnostic agent
